name: tezbridge.github.io
description: tezbridge is the one that allows you to visit the decentralized application of tomorrow in your browser and mobile today

scripts.b_m_tzclient: browserify js/tzclient.js --standalone TZClient -o js/build/tzclient.js && minify js/build/tzclient.js --outFile js/build/tzclient.min.js
scripts.build: npm run b_app && npm run b_plugin && npm run b_m_tzclient
